name: iscsgrpALT
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, ccsgrp2), wa(wcel(c0, csgrp2), wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2)))

stmt.origin: elrab2(hs0, c0, ccsgrp2, csgrp2, wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2), wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
stmt.pretty: elrab2(hs0, c0, ccsgrp2, csgrp2, c1[comLaw]c2, (+ ` hs0)[comLaw](Base ` hs0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ccsgrp2), wa(wcel(c0, csgrp2), wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2)))
-| wceq(ccsgrp2, crab(hs0, csgrp2, wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, csgrp2)
-| diffsw(hs0, wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CSGrpALT ↔(c0 ∈ SGrpALT ∧ c1[comLaw]c2))
⊣ (hs0 = c0 →((+ ` hs0)[comLaw](Base ` hs0)↔ c1[comLaw]c2))
⊣ CSGrpALT = { hs0 ∈ SGrpALT |(+ ` hs0)[comLaw](Base ` hs0)}
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, SGrpALT)
⊣ d(hs0, c1[comLaw]c2)
